table.name: location_resource_type
table.description: The resource type defined for the location

columns.name: RESOURCE_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Resource Type GID for the location.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The description of the location resource type.

columns.name: CONSTRAINT_APPOINTMENT
columns.description: Whether the location resource type constraints scheduling appointments.

columns.name: CALENDAR_GID
columns.description: The calendar GID that applies to the location resource type.

columns.name: AUTO_SCHEDULE_APPOINTMENT
columns.description: Indicate whether appointment should be automatically scheduled for the resource type.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
